text: No transfer or donation of any interest in real property under the authority of this subchapter shall constitute a local grant-in-aid in connection with any urban renewal project being undertaken with federal assistance under title I of the Housing Act of 1949, as amended.
historical:

References in Text

Title I of the Housing Act of 1949, as amended, referred to in this section, is the Act of July 15, 1949, 63 Stat. 413, ch. 338.

title.text: Housing and Building Restrictions and Regulations. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Transfer to Agency of Certain Property Near Maine Avenue.
